remarks: In a friendship graph, there is always a path/walk of length 2 between two different vertices as ordered triple.  (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 18-Feb-2018.)
statement: frg2wotn0 $p |- ( ( V FriendGrph E /\ ( A e. V /\ B e. V ) /\ A =/= B ) -> ( A ( V 2WalksOnOt E ) B ) =/= (/) ) $.
